description:
Chocolatey Community Validation Extension - Bringing package validation to the console.

The purpose of this extension is to provide validation and rules that needs to be adhered to when creating packages for the Chocolatey Community Repository.
The implemented rules will run when creating a package, and when pushing a package to Chocolatey Community Repository.

### Notes

- Only metadata/nuspec rules are currently supported.
summary: Extension implementing rules and validation for Chocolatey Community Repository packages
author: Chocolatey Software,  Inc.,  Chocolatey Community
